headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR): Assessing Valuation After New Fintech Partnership and U.S. Digital Bond Milestone
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions (BR) recently revealed a partnership with Xceptor that brings new automation to global tax relief and regulatory compliance. The company also played a key role in supporting Societe Generale’s first U.S. digital bond issuance. These latest moves reinforce Broadridge’s ongoing expansion into innovative fintech solutions for its global client base. See our latest analysis for Broadridge Financial Solutions.
